description:
JTL-Wawi is a free ERP software for e-commerce

JTL-Wawi is a free, powerful ERP software for e-commerce.
It manages products, orders, customers, suppliers, and warehouses centrally.

Features:
- Product management with variations and sets
- Multichannel integration (Amazon, eBay, shops, etc.)
- Warehouse management with inventory
- Shipping processing and tracking
- Invoice and accounting export
- POS integration (JTL-POS)
- Reporting and statistics

System Requirements:
- Windows 10/11 or Windows Server 2019/2022
- Microsoft SQL Server (Express, Standard, Enterprise) or SQL Server LocalDB
- 4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
- 2 GB free disk space
